## Vector4.scaleInPlace() method

Multiplies the current Vector4 coordinates by scale (float).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scaleInPlace(scale: number): Vector4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scale | <code>number</code> | the number to scale with |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector4`

the updated Vector4.
